column6:
These sharks get their common name for their very unique “bonnet” shaped head, their eyes are located on the rounded lobes on the side of their flattened head.

This species observed some regulate actions for communication and that includes head shakes, back hunching, puffing out the gill pouches, jaw snapping, circling head-to tail, in lines of up to five Bonnethead following one another.  

Despite of their funny looking, their eyes are actually highly adapted to help them see in low light using a special organ called tapetum lucidum or “eyeshine”.
column7:
حصلت أسماك القرش هذه على إسمها الشائع من شكل رأسها الفريد الذى يشبه الطاقية ,تقع عيونها على فصوص دائرية على جانب رؤوسها المسطحة.

لوحظ ان هذا النوع لديه اساليب منظمة للتواصل تتضمن هز الرأس , إنحناء الظهر , النفخ من الجراب الخيشومى , عض الفك ووصل الرأس بالذيل فى خطوط يمكن لأن تصل إلى خمسة قروش يتبع بعضهم الآخر.

على الرغم من مظهرها الطريف فأن أعينها تمكنها من الرؤية فى الإضاءة المنخفضة بأستخدام عضو خاص يسمى العين البراقة.

These fish have a very sharp, dagger-like teeth which prevent slipping of the prey from their mouth.

Barracuda can swim at the speed of 25 miles per hour. This feature is useful both for hunting and for escape from predators.

Their age can be determined by counting the rings on their scales and on their structure in the inner ear.
column7:

 أسماك الباراكودا يمكن أن تسبح بسرعة 25 ميلا في الساعة. هذه الميزة مفيدة سواء للصيد أو الهروب من المفترسين.

يمكن تحديد عمرها عن طريق عد الحلقات الموجودة على قشورها وعلى هيكلها في الأذن الداخلية.

column6:
The Porkfish has a deep body, a blunt snout, and thick lips. It maintains a higher dorsal profile than most grunts. 

Porkfish can produce grunt-like sounds using their teeth and swim bladder. These sounds seem to be particularly associated with situations when distress.

They are the only Caribbean grunt with two black vertical bars and yellow stripes
column7:

يمكن لهذه السمكة أن تصدر اصوات من خلال اسنانها وكيس المثانة المائية عندما تكون فى محنة .

هو النوع الوحيد الذي يمتلك شوكتان سوداوان و خطوط صفراء.

The Lookdown is best known for how thin it is, and its bright, shimmering blueish-silver scales which are highly reflective. 

When under stress, lookdowns will make grunt noises with their swim bladder and their teeth.

The metallic coloUr of this fish’s face can be used to confuse predators when these fish travel in schools.

column6:
Spanish hogfish are carnivorous that feed on invertebrates such as brittle stars, crustaceans, mollusks, and sea urchins.  

Juveniles act as cleaners. Juveniles act as cleaners until they reach the about eight centimeters in length at which point they switch their diet to feeding on invertebrates.

These fish are protogynous hermaphrodites means they change sex from females to males when females reach 15 to 18 centimeters in length
column7:

يلتقط الصغار أى شىء مثل عمال النظافة حتى يصل طولهم ل 8 سم عند هذه النقطة يحولون نظامهم الغذائي للتغذية على اللافقاريات.

These fish have powerful jaw  and canine teeth that use to crush crabs, clams and mollusks. 

They get their common name from their elongate, pig-like snout and large protrusible mouth.

They are prtogenious hermaprodite which means female can transform into male after they reach mature size.
column7:

بسبب خطمها الممدود وفمها  البارز مثل الخنزير. أُطلق عليها هذا الإسم.

These fish are protogynous hermaphrodites.  If a dominant male perishes, the largest female of the group will often morph to take its place.

To identify bewteen the male and female,males have bright red coloration while the female Lyretail Anthias tends to be more orange in coloration.

They are also know as the Scalefin fish.
